entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:25 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -41.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -41.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -60
Dewpoint: -46.4°C
Wind: NW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 39.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 39. Wind chill minus 60 this morning and minus 55 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 57 this evening and minus 64 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
